Summary Note:
The RM first encountered Beatriz Araceli Sánchez at a golf tournament in Madrid. They played a round of golf together and discussed potential business ventures, which led to a strong professional relationship.
Beatriz Araceli Sánchez is a 58 year old Developer from Spain. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons she decided to join.
Family Background: Beatriz Araceli Sánchez is currently divorced. Her child is named Valeria.
Education Background:
In 1984, Beatriz finished her secondary school education at IES Federico García Lorca Granada.
Beatriz attended University of Seville and graduated in 1990.
Occupation History:
Beatriz Araceli Sánchez is a 58 year old Developer from Spain. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Beatriz Araceli Sánchez began her professional journey as a Property Manager at Realia Business S.A. in 1990, laying the foundation for future success.
She then transitioned to Metrovacesa S.A. as a Developer, leveraging her expertise to drive results from 1992 till now.
Wealth Summary:
During her work, she focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 440000 EUR.
She owns flat in Castellón de la Plana, where she resides. It is worth 680000 EUR.

She inherited 6100000 EUR from her father, a well-known Tech Entrepreneur, in 2006, allowing her to expand her investment portfolio.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
